text: Ye Aung (; born 20 July 1947) is the incumbent Minister for Hotels and Tourism of Myanmar. == Early life and education == Ye Aung was born on 20 July 1947 in Nyaungshwe, Shan State, Burma (now Myanmar) to U Kywe and Mya Han. He is of Intha and Shan descent. == Career == == Personal life == He married to Khin Than Nwe, and has two children, Yin Myo Su and Kyaw Zeya. == References == Category:Living people Category:Government ministers of Myanmar Category:1947 births Category:People from Shan State Category:Burmese people of Shan descent
title: Ohn Maung (minister)
